title: Lowest Access to Electricity in Rural Areas
description: In 2023, only 0.4% of Chad's rural population had access to electricity, one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Lowest Electric Power Consumption
description: Chad's electric power consumption was only 14.47 kWh per capita in 2022, among the lowest in the world.

title: Lowest Literacy Rate
description: In 2022, Chad had an adult literacy rate of 27.28%, one of the lowest globally.

title: Highest Multidimensional Poverty
description: In 2019, 84.2% of Chad's population lived in multidimensional poverty, one of the highest rates worldwide.

title: Highest Maternal Mortality Ratio
description: Chad had a maternal mortality ratio of 1389 per 100,000 live births in 2015, one of the highest in the world.

title: Highest Percentage of Children in Employment
description: In 2015, 55.9% of children aged 7-14 in Chad were employed, one of the highest rates globally.
